name: Basic Slicer
description:
Use the arrow keys ⬆⬇⬅➡ to move. Use SPACE to begin slicing. Slicing stops when you touch a side of the area, or release SPACE. Press R to restart.

Learning the ropes with Unity and itch.io.

This is the second in a challenge to release a game every week. Honestly... it was a lot more difficult than I initially estimated. Lots of geometry to brush up on!

Anyway, I've cut some corners 🙄 and published it as it is. Lots of bugs, lots of potential.

The inspiration for this is the Volfied game which I used to play as a kid.

—Merwllyra
